children.name: transformOrigin
children.description: Determines the transform origin point based on two elements' boxes. The method is primarily used in zoom/transfer effects.

children.name: fitScale
children.description: Determines the fit scale factor based on two elements' boxes.

children.name: fillScale
children.description: Determines the fill scale factor based on two elements' boxes.

children.name: box

parameters.name: element `HTMLElement`
parameters.description: The element to calculate dimensions for.

children.description: Calculates the offset and dimensions of the given element
